post:
Hey LET,

So it's been a while since I've posted an offer for [VPN.sh](http://www.vpn.sh) here, and the service has recently undergone a fair amount of work to ensure that support and uptime are sorted out (they've both been issues in the past).

NOTE: This offer is £4 per two years of service, not per year.

>**Features**:
>
>* PPTP, L2TP, OpenVPN
>* Australia, Canada, France, Germany, India, Ireland, Japan, Netherlands, New Zealand, Russia, Singapore, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom, USA
>* Up to three concurrent connections

**£4/Two Years Unlimited Bandwidth VPN - [Order Link](https://www.vpn.sh/clients/cart.php?a=add&pid=55)**

This offer has limited stock.

Thanks!

_Note: I understand that some users may be concerned about uptime. I'm in the process of improving our [status page](http://www.vpnshserver.com), however for the time being you're able to see a basic page displaying which locations are up. Logged uptime will be there soon._
